channel.title: Help me rename server
channel.description: i use the 718 -723 source it have changed me SERVER-NAME = 'something" but it only changes on my depositbox and my dialogs but when i open my bank or my friend list it stil shows matrix realy want to changes this but have tryd somethings but didnt work plz someone help :confused:

item.title: Help me rename server
item.dc:creator: @looted_y00 looted y00
item.description:
@looted_y00 wrote:

Search for whatever it says that you dont want it to say in both client and source
go into any file that has it in and do

Ctrl+h

“text you wana replace”

“your server name”

be sure to do it in client and source and then your set

Read full topic
